name: Pocket Piano Song Universe Lite
description:
Try out Pocket Piano Song Universe for free!

"A great way to try out the fantastic Pocket Piano Song Universe for free - learn hundreds of songs on the piano by playing in time with the falling notes on the screen - very addictive and educational at the same time."- appseekr.com, Free App of the Day

Pocket Piano Song Universe(PPSU) is a feature loaded piano which includes the ability to upload and download songs from a global community. PPSU has a unique piano training mode which will teach you how to play any song in the library. From Beethoven to modern day hits, our song library includes some of the most popular songs, themes, and movie soundtracks of all time.

This lite version allows you to learn 7 popular songs selected from the over 1000 (and growing) currently in the Song Universe Library.

***If you would like more songs and to compose your own and share them with the world, download the full version of Pocket Piano Song Universe today. Now with over 1,000 songs!***

Better Day Wireless. Better Apps. Better Value.
